lfg.error.generic: I sharted all over your file and can't add you to LFG.
lfg.empty.pbp: Sorry, kid. Folks like their live games.
lfg.empty.low: Weird. Need more meat for the grinder. Invite some friends!
lfg.empty.mid: Too busy FTBing to LFG. Tell 'em to get a life and play D&D with you!
lfg.empty.high: Apparently they've all been annihilated by spheres of varying sizes. Shame.
lfg.empty.epic: Sorry, bub. Looks like they're already being space pirates on the Astral Plane.
lfg.removed.tier: {user} is no longer LFG for a {tierLabel} game.
lfg.list.title: __Looking For Group__
